channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Nathaniel Howe shares the business side of music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: CHASE WOODS ? Maiea.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: REED MUSIC ? Murimuri Aroha.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six visits a night shelter in Hamilton where she was first homeless while transitioning. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six reflects back on her journey. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: Fighting for a spot in the semi-finals, R?nui Primary take on Wairere Touch Club and Puurekireki Marae play against Kahotea Marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aroha Nui Say I Do
channel.desc: Auckland based wedding celebrant Lois Hawley-Simmonds is a busy principal during the week but come Saturday she switches p?tae to her other vocation. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hur? P?pi
channel.desc: Develops the skills of new mums and dads raising their babies in the M?ori language. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Whare K?hanga Reo
channel.desc: Communities give some much needed love to tired and run-down k?hanga across New Zealand. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Super Kura
channel.desc: As mahi continues to get the preschool open, Clara and Manga are worried about Mungzy's seizures. Also, we meet a young boy with brittle bone disease who just wants to run and play. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Ogglies - Welcome to Smelliville
channel.desc: The Ogglies move to the beautiful, peaceful village of Smelliville. Unfortunately, Smelliville has a stinky problem, the local garbage dump is spoiling the place. Something must be done. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Eagle Vs Shark
channel.desc: Eagle vs Shark is the tale of two socially awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love; through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sidewalk Karaoke
channel.desc: Te H?mua Nikora hits the streets in search of karaoke talent. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Pai
channel.desc: Te Ataakura and Waiata learn about the speediest aorangi in our solar system, Ap?rangi! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Nan are approached by Grace who offers to buy the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Cube
channel.desc: An exciting youth series and a hub for rangatahi content. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Molly Of Denali
channel.desc: The daily adventures of 10-year-old Alaska native Molly Mabray, her family, her dog Suki and her friends Tooey and Trini.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Mana Kuratahi Kapa Haka 2023
channel.desc: The top primary schools from around the Aotearoa compete at the national competition held at Trafalgar Centre, Nelson. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Mana Kuratahi Kapa Haka 2023
channel.desc: The top primary schools from around the Aotearoa compete at the national competition held at Trafalgar Centre, Nelson. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Indigenous 100
channel.desc: Julian Wilcox goes one-on-one with indigenous thought leaders from around the world. Reikura Kahi and Kawariki Morgan - from foundation kura kaupapa kids to Te Matatini champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: Fighting for a spot in the semi-finals, R?nui Primary take on Wairere Touch Club and Puurekireki Marae play against Kahotea Marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution
channel.desc: A joyful celebration of pacific cuisine. Across Fiji, Samoa, the Kingdom of Tonga and Vanuatu, contestants will face incredible challenges bringing Pacific Island cuisine into the spotlight. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Heritage Rescue
channel.desc: Brigid Gallagher travels NZ to visit a different heritage site each episode. Along with her team, Brigid gets the exhibition organised, creating new exhibits and uncovering fascinating stories. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Ogglies - Welcome to Smelliville
channel.desc: The Ogglies move to the beautiful, peaceful village of Smelliville. Unfortunately, Smelliville has a stinky problem, the local garbage dump is spoiling the place. Something must be done. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Bamay
channel.desc: A showcase of Australia?s most diverse and stunning landscapes, shot from the air and inspired by the word Bamay, which means land in the Bundjalung language from northern New South Wales.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, North Shore Eco Tours, and Manea: Footprints of Kupe. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Meet some of the living legends of Aotearoa, the M?ori leaders who were raised through the challenging years where te reo M?ori was shunned. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: NEW: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: PREMIERE: As Erin and Saxon begin their journey of discovery on Treaty 1 territory in Manitoba, they learn how the concept of land surrender was obscured by the Crown?s manipulation.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Someday Stories
channel.desc: When an insecure teenage boy gets hit in the balls for the first time while playing cricket, he lies about the pain to appear strong in front of his friends. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Lunana: A Yak in the Classroom
channel.desc: An aspiring singer living with his grandmother in the capital of Bhutan dreams of getting a visa to move to Australia. (R).

channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. Final preparations are underway, however there are issues with the sound. Will they make the stage or not? (R).

channel.title: Oranga Ng?kau
channel.desc: Yvonne Te Wanihi Edwards presents uniquely M?ori exercise workouts for young and old to keep fit and healthy. (R).

channel.desc: Chef Juan provides Rewi with his biggest challenge to date. They will need to cook 4 cow legs weighing in at 120kgs for up to 800 people. With this amount of meat, timing is everything. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: The Eriwata homestead, on the Waiwhakaiho River in Ng?motu, was one of the very first houses in the area and an important pit stop for wh?nau travelling to Parihaka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nomad
channel.desc: NEW: Explores the contemporary experience of people living off the land in Te Waipounamu, seen through the eyes of a young M?ori nomad intent on living off the land like his t?puna before him.

channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.title: Everybody's Oma
channel.desc: During lockdown filmmaker Jason van Genderen created a supermarket at home and accidentally turned 'Oma' into an internet celebrity. (R).

channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).
